item.description:
Register and learn more at http://www.ctreia.com...

Be sure to check your email after registering - we will email you the phone number and pin access code for this teleseminar.

Did You Miss Monday's Monthly Meeting? Then listen in as we interview Mark Klee.

Discover why the Bankruptcy Niche is so attractive for real estate investors right now. Hear an example of a real estate transaction involving bankruptcy. Find out how this compares to short sales and REOs as a strategy.

Do you have your own questions about the bankruptcy niche? Email them to Membership@ctreia.com before the call and we will answer as many as we can. "See" you on Tuesday night!

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: Free Teleseminar With Mark Klee: Turn Bankruptcies Into Gold
